QuestData.Title: For The Children!
QuestData.Description: Wait, wait! Don't attack me! I've changed!$B$BReally, I've turned over a new leaf, I promise. I haven't said "DOOOOOOM!" in months! All I care about now is saving the poor little orphans of Azeroth, whose parents have been taken by this tragic war.$B$BThat's why I'm here! Why, with just a single Miniature Iron Star, I could provide clean water and power for all of the orphans of Azeroth! And no one could stop me!$B$BSo, what do you think, sweetcheeks? Want to help ol' Milhouse save the orphans?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Miniature Iron Star from Upper Blackrock Spire.
